Text: thank you for the upload... Thats cool
can you tell me how you upload this cover ?rn

I usually have a folder on my desktop so i can put my images into that i want to upload,you can get pictures from google images they are easy to find.nnOn your piratebay upload torrent pagengoto --> Image tag from bayimg - - - click on the bayimg link which will open a new page.nnClick the browse button to find your image on your computer.nGoto --> Removal Code and enter a password [one that you will remember]nGoto --> Tags, I dont bother with tags [leave it blank]nGoto --> Settings and click on it. A sub menu opens. Click on Resize image, and highlight --> 300 x 300 TPB - Image TorrentnnNow click UPLOADnnAfter a minute or less, your image will be uploaded.nnHere is an example of what you should seennhttp://bayimg.com/oADpmaacInnall you need is the last 9 letters/numbers on the image [just double click them, and copy them]nn--> oADpmaacInnNow go back to your piratebay torrent upload page and paste in those last nine digets from bayimg boxnnWhen you have finished making your torrent and uploaded it, you should have a picture on your uploaded page.
